mapper.select: select id, login, bitwiseRole, active from Users order by login
select id as userId, login, password from Users where login = #{login, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and active = true
mapper.insert: insert into Users (login, bitwiseRole, password, active) values ( #{login, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bitwiseRole, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} )
mapper.delete: delete from Users where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update Users set active = true where id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
update Users set active = false where id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
